use_cases.case: The Aeromonas caviae strain WCW1-2 genome (CP039832) was included in a comparative BLAST analysis of AvGI1-like sequences found in the newly sequenced strains and related Aeromonas strains.
The Aeromonas caviae strain WCW1-2 genome (CP039832) was used to source mcr-3 sequences for inclusion in a phylogenetic analysis with those sourced from genomes of other strains.
